mapper.select: SELECT A.MNG_NAME AS MNGNAME, C.DEPTID2 AS DEPTID, B.SCODE_VALUE AS MNGSUBJECT, NVL(D.CLASS_NAME,'-') AS SCHOOLNAME FROM MANAGER A LEFT OUTER JOIN STANDARDCODE B ON A.MNG_SUBJECT = B.SCODE_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS D ON A.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.SCODE_VALUE AS DEPTID2, B.SCODE_KEY AS SKEY FROM MANAGER A, STANDARDCODE B WHERE A.MNG_ID=#{id} AND A.DEPT_ID = B.SCODE_KEY ) C ON A.DEPT_ID = C.SKEY WHERE A.MNG_ID=#{id}
